sense.def:
Kadar človek
maintains something
, ima tisto še naprej in skrbi, da se ne konča ali zmanjša.

seg.quote: I wanted to maintain my friendship with her.
For twenty-five years they had failed to maintain law and order.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
maintains something at a particular rate or level
, tisto ohranja na določeni stopnji ali višini.

seg.quote: One has to maintain the temperature at a very high level.

sense.def:
To maintain someone
pomeni, da nekomu dajemo denar in stvari, ki jih potrebuje.

seg.quote: I need the money to maintain me until I start a job.

sense.def:
To maintain a building, vehicle, road, or machine
pomeni, da stavbo, vozilo, cesto ali stroj ohranjamo v dobrem stanju.

seg.quote: ...the rising cost of maintaining the equipment.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
maintains that something is true
, zelo odločno izrazi svoje mnenje, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: Mrs Camish always maintained that he had been a brilliant thinker.
